summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 1.9°C) and outside temperature (down 1.7°C) and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.4 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in pressure (down 6 mbar), rainfall (up 0.4 mm), light levels (up 3101 lux), and cloud levels (up 413 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1348 m), rainfall (up 0.1 mm), and light levels (up 5449 lux) when compared to today.

Yesterday, cloud levels hit a low of 860m and a high of 3110m, averaging 1459.9m; the past week and month reported somewhat higher averages.
cloud levels.summary: Expect mostly clear skies with high cloud.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; warm but comfortable temperatures are expected. Also, you’ll experience intense stickiness in the air. Possible light showers, mostly clear skies with high cloud, and bright intervals likely. Weather could become unsettled.
